title: Blended Learning Design-Based Secondary Social Studies Education Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in operating secondary education curricula and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: A course for in-service secondary teachers to acquire blended learning design competencies applicable to social studies instruction. Emphasizes real-time collaboration and feedback activities in mobile and BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more social studies lessons based on blended teaching methodologies
Learners can develop two learner-engagement activities using digital tools and improve them through peer evaluation
Learners can establish a sustainable feedback system to measure learning effectiveness
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
